version_description:
* Fixed app size might increase significantly
* Added notification if photo is not authorized to access
* Minor bugs fixed

* It's not recommended to update your NAS to DSM 6.0 beta, this app might not work.
* Added Log to show the number of photos processed and warning message if any.
* Added warning message if fail to backup photo, detail will be shown in Log.
* Minor UI improved.
* Minor bugs fixed.

* Added DSM 6.0 support.
* Fixed video copying problem in iOS 9.3.
* Improved video copying stability.
** We recommend all users to do a fresh backup via Reset Backup (under menu), because it's possible that some videos might not backup successfully in previous version of this app.

* Improved UI. Restore function is moved to menu.
* Added advertisement. In-app purchase will remove it.
* Minor bugs fixed

* Fixed an issue which backup might fail in DSM 6.0.1 .
* General performance improved.
* Minor bugs fixed.

Added support 2-step login authentication.
Improved stability and performance.
Minor bugs fixed.
* Fixed a bug that might cause an error: unrecognized format

* Added automatic backup capability.
* Improved UI.
* Minor bugs fixed.

* Automatic backup is removed, due to the app is not appropriate to use background location update. We are now working on new solution, hope to bring back the feature in the near future.
* Added iCloud Photo Library support
* Added skip existing backup option
* Added backup video option
* Performance improved
* Minor bugs fixed

* Added DSM 6.1 support.
* Minor bugs fixed.

* Added Free Up Space feature. After backup, delete old photos by the time given, for example: photos that were taken one year ago.
* Added Automatic Backup feature. If turned on, the app will start backup whenever it detects a significant change in your iPhone's location.
* Perfomance improved
* Minor bugs fixed

* We welcome your suggestion/feedback, please send it via our support email. Thank you for your support!
* Added option for sub-folders creation.
* Menu re-arranged and improved.
* Performance improved.
* Minor bugs fixed.
* Minor bugs fixed

* Added: backup will not be stopped if exporting photos failed. The failed photos will be shown in Log, and can be retried.
* Log added the capability to retry backup for failed photos.
* Added FAQ in menu.

* This demo app will pause every 30 photos. In-app purchase can unlock full version.
* Minor bugs fixed
* fixed a bug that log detail is not shown.
Added iOS 11 support.

* Both video and image are now extracted from Live Photo. It can be turned off via Options.
* User interface improved, including Free Up Space and Reset Backup.
* Minor bugs fixed.

* Fixed compatibility with iOS 9 .
* Minor UI improved and bugs fixed.

* Improved In-app purchase functionality.
* Minor bugs fixed.

* Added landscape and iPad split screen support.
* UI improved.
* Bugs fixed.
* Minor bugs fixed and user interface improved.

* The app will now try to continue backup for a few minutes when it goes to background.
* Minor bugs fixed and performance improved.

* Fixed a bug that EXIF metadata might be lost.
* Minor bugs fixed and performance improved.
* Minor bugs fixed and performance improved.
* Improved stability, minor bugs fixed.

* Fixed video backup issue in iOS 13.
* Improved stability and fixed minor bugs.
* To fix issues in your earlier backup, please re-backup via Menu > Options > Reset Backup.
* Minor bugs fixed and user interface improved.

* If any photo is incomplete, a warning dialog is now displayed that leads directly to the log window to try again.
* When the app is opened, it now displays the total number of automatic backup photos, if any.
* Bugs fixed and performance improved.

* Added new feature: Options > Detect Imported Photos.
* Port number is now shown on NAS setting dialog.
* Minor bugs fixed and performance improved.
* Fixed a bug where Live Photo's video export might not work.
* User interface renewed.

• Added ‘Backup Albums Only’ option to ‘Photo Albums’ feature.
• Brand new ‘Free Up Space’ feature for iOS 15.
• Added ‘Exclude Video’ option to ‘Automatic Backup’ feature.
• Added ‘Exclude Video on Cellular’ option to ‘Video Backup’.
• Added ‘Allow Cellular Data’ option to ‘Options > Advanced’.
• Improved user interface and iOS 15 compatibility.
